data.Name: Gracie Abrams
data.Bio: Gracie Abrams (born September 7, 1999) is a singer/songwriter from Los Angeles, most known for video snippets of her songs released through Instagram. After having only three tracks publically available on her Soundcloud: And She Will Miss You, blue, i kinda miss you Gracie released her first debut track Mean It along with an accompanying music video on October 24th, 2019. Shortly after, Gracie released two other singles, Stay and 21. On April 8th, 2020, I miss you, I'm sorry was released as the first song off Gracieâ€™s first project. Read more on Last.fm
